mapper.delete:
UPDATE MyUrlRegist
deleteName =#{deleteName}, deleteTime =#{deleteTime}, curStatus=0
WHERE pageId=#{pageId} and pageid not in ('topmenu')

UPDATE MyUrlRegist
deleteName =#{deleteName}, deleteTime =#{deleteTime}, curStatus=0
WHERE pageId in (${pageId}) and pageid not in ('topmenu')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MyUrlRegist WHERE pageId = #{pageId} and pageid not in ('topmenu') and curStatus=2 order by security asc
SELECT * FROM MyUrlRegist WHERE pageId in (${_parameter }) and pageid not in ('topmenu') and curStatus=2 order by security asc
SELECT * FROM MyUrlRegist WHERE pageid not in ('topmenu') and formType!=5 and curStatus=2 order by security asc
select count(*) from MyUrlRegist WHERE pageid not in ('topmenu') and formType!=5 and curStatus=2
SELECT contextmenu FROM MyUrlRegist WHERE pageId = #{pageId} AND pageid NOT IN ('topmenu') AND menuNum = 2 AND curStatus=2 order by security asc
mapper.update: UPDATE MyUrlRegist SET contextmenu=#{contextmenu} WHERE pageId = #{pageId} AND pageid NOT IN ('topmenu') AND menuNum = 2 AND curStatus=2
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(`security`) + 1, CONVERT (CONCAT((SELECT `security` FROM myurlregist WHERE pageid = #{parentId} AND curStatus = 2),'001'),SIGNED)) AS `security` FROM MyUrlRegist WHERE parentId = #{parentId} AND curStatus = 2
mapper.update: UPDATE myurlregist SET security = CASE pageId WHEN #{id} THEN #{num} WHEN #{sid} THEN #{snum} END WHERE pageId IN (#{id},#{sid});
mapper.delete: DELETE from MyUrlRegist WHERE parentId=#{parentId} and formType = #{formType}
